translations: v.渗透，弥漫；（观点、信念、感情等）充满，充斥

sentences.sentence: Water will easily permeate a cotton dress.
sentences.translation: 水很容易渗透棉布衣服。

sentences.sentence: Fossils are often washed together on-site in a large bath which can allow water and contaminants in the form of contemporary DNA to permeate into the porous bones.
sentences.translation: 化石通常在大浴池中进行现场清洗，这可以使水和现代 DNA 形式的污染物渗透到多孔骨骼中。
现代生活处处离不开统计。
